title: "AI life sciences software startup Axtria raises $150M"
excerpt: "Life sciences software startup Axtria Inc. has reportedly been valued at close to $1 billion after picking up $150 million in a funding round led by Bain Capital Tech Opportunities. Axtria was founded in 2010 and provides cloud based data management and artificial intelligence software for companies in the life sciences industry,"
